Reviews.Title: “Had a pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: Isak146
Reviews.Content: I really have nothing negative to say about this hotel. Staff was friendly and spoke reasonable english, the room was clean, and food -- particularly the breakfast -- was excellent. I really appreciated the staircase! In most modern hotels you have to use the elevator, which I hate. The only trouble might be the location. Even though it is located right on a tram line, you may want to look for a more central hotel, if all you want to do is sight seeing. I attended a conference, so it did not matter. I had a very pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Some non friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: alio0oila
Reviews.Content: Thought it was better I had a room smells sigarates couldnt have good sleep The best part is having breakfast in the wonderful garden

Reviews.Title: “Old 5 Stars”
Reviews.Author: Tessa1001
Reviews.Content: We just stayed for 2 days in the hotel but we found it too old for a 5 stars. For business is ok cause is 15 min by taxi from the airport but not for tourism because of the distance. The best thing, in my opinion, is the breakfast not only for the variety but for the old woman doing a kind of wrap on a hot stone, is delicious.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all costs!”
Reviews.Author: Drawohamme
Reviews.Content: Filthy, smelly, impossible to complain unless you speak good turkish, the five star rating is an utter lie. Getting stuck here was my own fault for not checking trip advisor first!

Reviews.Title: “Moving me to another green park hotel on arrival”
Reviews.Author: istanbul1963
Reviews.Content: Here is my real time experince with this hotel I have business meeting in Merter therefore I booked a room at the green park hotel (Merter) through expedia. Every thing was cvonfirmed and I have paid the money. On the day I arrived to the hotel I was told bythe receptionests (who were un freindly) that they have decided to move all expedia booking to another green park hotel in Pendik which is 1-2 hours away from green park hotel Merter. At the end I had to cancell my booking and book with another hotel (merbel hotel) which was very good and people there were very freindly. I foundf this not profesional by all standard. First they have never phone me to let me know that they are planing to move me to another hotel and second I choice that hotel because it was very close to where I was going to have my meeting. If you book with this hotel please make sure that this will never happen to you.

Reviews.Title: “rubbish bins at the entrance to the hotel door”
Reviews.Author: harylondon
Reviews.Content: A very dirty hotel. There are large rubbish bins at the entrance to the hotel door. with a great noise of garbage trucks come every night to collect the garbage.

Reviews.Title: “Overall for our family it was best...”
Reviews.Author: najafihamideh
Reviews.Content: Overall for our family it was best choice,best value,next to tramva and at least under presure of the name of five star hotel it had a four star hotels quality and service for every person we paid 43$ per night

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: Taxithi
Reviews.Content: This is a plain structure with very little to recommend it. The staff is aloof and non-caring, the food service is lackluster and the food is dismal. In short it is cold and ugly. The rooms are built neither for beauty nor efficiency. The rooms are large enough, but uncomfortable to eye and body. We went for a walk along the busier streets about the hotel, but found nothing to recommend it. Whilst we were there a wedding reception was going full force on the green below. it was noisy and annoying.

Reviews.Title: “Over Rated”
Reviews.Author: skusderci
Reviews.Content: This hotel was rated as a 5 star, not at all close! The staff were friendly, and tried to be helpful, however not knowing basic english is ESSENTIAL in such a large city as Istanbul! We ordered a meal on the roof top terrace, great breeze, however the music was way too loud and cheesy. The meal took over an hour to arrvive and ALL courses came at once! My partner who speaks Turkish asked the waiter why he would do this, the waiter shrugged and walked away! Not at all a five star service! The air conditioning was not working, I asked on 2 seperate occassions to have this fixed; I was told they did fix it, only to discover that "fixing the air conditioning meant opening the window!" I returned to the room on many occassions after 2;00 to change for another meeting (humid and hot) only to discover that my room had still not been cleaned! Not at all impressed with this hotel! Especially paying â‚¬9,00 for a shot of Barcardi's rum! We couldn't believe this, and asked because we thought it must be an error! Absolutely ridiculous! Even when I've stayed at proper 5 star hotels they didn't charge this much for a drink! The bathroom was too small to step out of the shower without almost landing in the toilet! The pictures on the net are NOT what you get! Will be going back to Istanbul next month, WILL NOT BE STAYING at any of the Green Parks!

Reviews.Title: “Recommended”
Reviews.Author: PK173
Reviews.Content: I spent 3 nights here in April. The hotel is clean and spacious as are the rooms. The staff were friendly and helpful without being overbearing. The bar is suitably bar-like and the restaurant serves a good breakfast and dinner here was quite good too. The airport pickup an transfer worked flawlessly too. Altogether a pain free experience. Just the way I like it. I don't do adventure any more.

Reviews.Title: “Not up to any 5 star hotel i have ever been in!”
Reviews.Author: KateWill76
Reviews.Content: On entering the hotel the reception is exactly what you expect until the staff deal with you. I didn't expect a 5 star hotel to chat to each other and not give you there full attention when booking in. Guy taking us up to the room was ok but the room was dingy and oldfashioned The pool in the afternoon was good to start with as there were plenty of beds and the pool was clean. However the bar staff were incompetent and whilst sunbathing a host of business men in suits were invited to the area which was slightly uncomfortable for holiday makers as they strolled past on their mobile phones. Do not visit the 'Beauty Salon' as the ladies there do not speak English - they gather around like hens chatting away to themselves, doing each other's nails and totally abandoning their customer - I walked out after half an hour, having been left with my feet in cold water The worst part of the stay was the room at night, as the air con was to say the least not very good and the only way to stay cool at night was to get up and have a cold shower. Food at the restaurant at night was ok as was the breakfast. The shuttle service from the hotel to the airport was excellent. All in all this is not a 5 star hotel in my opinion and would advise you to find alternative arrangements when visiting the area!

Reviews.Title: “Avoid this Hotel at all cost”
Reviews.Author: Ontheglobe
Reviews.Content: They advertise list it as a 5 start place, it does not rate even as a per hour Motel. The rooms are foul, the place is not clean and the bathroom were fetid to say the lease. The hotel advertise having free WI-FI service in the rooms, I change 4 rooms and none of them have the service, they have a pay service for 25 Euro, as well it does not work and they will not admit a refund. The frond desk personal does not speak English. The dinner in the hotel restaurant or bar, is deplorable. Final suggestion Avoid this place!!!

Reviews.Title: “good for business travel”
Reviews.Author: tkkhk
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice and convenient as it close to our client's office. The bathtub/shower was yucky though -- it was an awkward step up into the tub and had dirty black spots. Nice staff at the restaurant/bar. They have good lentil soup. The lady at the breakfast buffet makes great turkish cheese bread.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Burren
Reviews.Content: About 15 mins from the airport. Average rooms with international t.v. Bar at lobby level and restuarant. Live music nightly but can be a bit too loud. Not a great location for seeing the sites as most are near the centre. Mainly a business hotel, although the hotel has a nice rooftop pool and bar which opens for the summer months. There is a nice indoor pool and gym in the lower level. Breakfast is good and the hotel price is competitive. Cannot get an iron and ironing board at hotel, you must give it to laundry to get pressed and pay for this service.

HotelInfo.Name: The Green Park Hotel Merter
HotelInfo.Address: NazIm Erten Sok. No: 13, Istanbul 34173, Turkey
